description: Create a new Xray Cloud test case with scenario, specifications, steps, and optional custom fields. Returns the created test key/id and a link.

categories.description: Optional tags or categories for classification.

customFields.description: Optional Xray custom field values. Each entry defines a single custom field by its name and the value to assign. Use this when you need to populate Jira/Xray custom fields during creation.

name.description: The custom field name or key as defined in Jira/Xray (for example, 'Test Level' or 'cf_12345').

value.description: The value to assign to the custom field.

project.description: The Jira project key (for example, PROJ).

scenario.description: Short human-readable test scenario or title.

steps.description: Main test steps with one or more expected results per step.

action.description: Step instruction or action to perform.

testSetup.description: Optional setup steps executed before the main steps.

expectedResults.description: Expected outcomes for the setup step.

testTeardown.description: Optional teardown steps executed after the main steps.

expectedResults.description: Expected outcomes for the teardown step.

tolerance.description: Optional tolerance percentage for acceptance criteria.

name: new_xray_test

link.description: Direct URL to the created test in Jira/Xray.
